title: Peter Norvig - Stanford HAI
snippet: Peter Norvig, Distinguished Education Fellow at the Stanford HAI, comments on how limiting the budget at an AI agent’s disposal as well as transaction times and capabilities can help AI agents “operate safely within defined boundaries."
